Tufts CSDD Executive Forum Series: Strategies for Optimizing the Drug Development Process: Translational Science, New Technologies, and Clinical Program Design Improvement
When: Thursday, November 4th 2010, from 10 a.m. to 4 p.m.
Where: Tufts Center for the Study of Drug Development
75 Kneeland Street, Suite 1100
Boston, MA 02111
Website and Registration: http://csdd.tufts.edu...
During this final 2010 round-table in our acclaimed series, we will focus on the use of translational science and how biotech and pharmaceutical companies have been streamlining timelines with the use of new tools and technologies. In this roundtable, a presentation of Tufts CSDD findings will be followed by specific examples of strategies in biotech, pharmaceutical and academic institutions. Created in 2008, The Tufts CSDD Executive Forum is the only program of its kind. Quarterly roundtable discussions, held in a facilitated and interactive small group format, offer senior pharmaceutical and biotechnology company executives an opportunity to share ideas and experiences in R&D strategy, management, and practice. For more information, please contact Stella Stergiopoulos at stella.stergiopoulos@tufts.edu or call 617-636-2170.
